summary: This is an internal FBI email from July 29, 2020, requesting assistance for Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) related to the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. It highlights the high-profile nature of the case and seeks available agents to contact a Special Agent (SA) and copy their respective Supervisory Special Agent (SSA).

persons.name: Tracy
persons.context: Addressed in the email for visibility regarding the request for agent assistance on the Epstein/Maxwell case.

events.title: FBI Request for Investigation Assistance
events.description: The FBI's Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) sends an internal request for assistance with the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, describing it as a unique, high-profile opportunity.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively seeking additional agent assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation as of July 29, 2020.
The investigation was being handled by Squad C-20, which focuses on VCAC/HT (likely Violent Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking).
The case was described internally as a 'high profile case' and a 'unique opportunity'.
The communication indicates the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell was ongoing at that time.
